definition: big/huge/large/major/great/wide/deep/older (than)/oldest/eldest/greatly/very much/(dialect) father/father's elder or younger brother

pinyin: Er4 ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4
Di4 yi1 ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4
Di4 er4 Ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4

sentences.english: Thank you North Korea. This might start WW3.
sentences.chinese: 感謝北朝鮮，這可能會引發第三次世界大戰。

sentences.english: Service was suspended during both world wars.
sentences.chinese: 在兩次世界大戰期間都曾停駛。

sentences.english: He saw service in both World Wars.
sentences.chinese: 他在兩次世界大戰中都服過役。

sentences.english: He fought in both World Wars.
sentences.chinese: 他在兩次世界大戰中都打過仗。

sentences.english: Since then contact were lost and severed with Malaya because of the World War.
sentences.chinese: 因爲世界大戰爆發，所以他們與馬來亞就失去了聯繫。

sentences.english: We are really working hard to start a WWIII, don't we?….
sentences.chinese: 我們在努力挑起第三次世界大戰，是嗎？

sentences.english: He has come through two world wars.
sentences.chinese: 他身經兩次世界大戰，劫後餘生。

sentences.english: Switzerland is a neutral country in the two world wars.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士在兩次世界大戰中都是中立國家。

sentences.english: It took a world warto draw America irrevocably onto the world stage.
sentences.chinese: 世界大戰才把美國不可更改地拉上了世界舞臺。

sentences.english: Civilization may be expunged if there is another world war.
sentences.chinese: 如再打一場世界大戰，人類文明可能會遭到毀滅。

sentences.english: It was not just defeat in two world wars.
sentences.chinese: 原因不僅是它在兩次世界大戰中戰敗。

sentences.english: Switzerland's policy of neutrality has served it will through two world wars.
sentences.chinese: 瑞士的中立政策，曾任職它將通過兩次世界大戰。

sentences.english: That becomes one of the causes for the start of WWIII.
sentences.chinese: 這成爲第三次世界大戰原因之一。

sentences.english: I’ll let you know if you’ve just caused World War III.
sentences.chinese: 如果因爲你而導致了第三次世界大戰，我會告訴你的。

sentences.english: Many young people joined up during the two World Wars.
sentences.chinese: 兩次世界大戰中，許多年輕人蔘軍入伍。

sentences.english: The outbreak of the world war drew Addams actively into the peace movement.
sentences.chinese: 世界大戰的爆發促使亞當斯積極參與了和平運動。

definition: to cross swords/to have a confrontation (with sb)

pinyin: Di4 er4 Ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4
Er4 ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4
Di4 yi1 ci4 Shi4 jie4 Da4 zhan4

definition: Chinese Nationalist Party 國民黨|国民党[Guo2 min2 dang3] and Chinese Communist Party 共產黨|共产党[Gong4 chan3 dang3]
to face an attack/to repulse the enemy
Great Leap Forward (1958-1960), Mao's attempt to modernize China's economy, which resulted in economic devastation, and millions of deaths from famine caused by misguided policies
to encircle and annihilate/refers to repeated campaigns of the Guomindang against the communists from 1930 onwards
